content.query:
Create Schema Dim

Create Schema Fact 

CREATE TABLE Dim.TaxiZones
	(
	 [LocationID] bigint,
	 [Borough] nvarchar(400),
	 [Zone] nvarchar(400),
	 [service_zone] nvarchar(400)
	)
	WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)

GO

CREATE TABLE [Dim].[PaymentType] 

( 

PaymentID INT NOT NULL,

PaymentType NVARCHAR(20)
) 

WITH 
( 
    DISTRIBUTION = Replicate,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


Create Table Dim.FHvBases
(
    BaseLicenseId Varchar(50),
    BaseType Varchar(50),
    AddressBuilding Varchar(100),
    AddressStreet Varchar(100),
    AddressCity Varchar(100),
    AddressState Varchar(100), 
    AddressPostalCode Varchar(10)
)



---Alter table with BaseLicenseId
CREATE TABLE [Fact].[TripDetails]
(
	[VendorId] [int] NULL,
	[TransactionKey] [varchar](50) NULL,
	[PickupTime] [datetime2](7) NULL,
	[DropTime] [datetime2](7) NULL,
	[PassangerCount] [int] NULL,
	[TripDistance] [float] NULL,
	[RateCodeId] [int] NULL,
	[PickupLocationId] [int] NULL,
	[DropLocationId] [int] NULL,
	[PaymentTypeId] [int] NULL,
	[TotalAmount] [float] NULL,
	[TipAmount] [float] NULL,
	[TripYear] [varchar](4) NULL,
	[TripMonth] [varchar](2) NULL,
	[TripDay] [varchar](2) NULL,
	[Fhv_flag] [int] NULL,
	[FhvBusinessID] [varchar](10) NULL,
	[Fhv_BaseLicenceId] [Varchar](50) null
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

CREATE TABLE RateCodes
(
	RateCodeId INT,
	RateCode VARCHAR(100),
	IsApproved BIT
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Vendor](
	[VendorID] [int] NULL,
	[Vendor_name] [nvarchar](50) NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Dim.Business
(
	BusinessId nvarchar(10) Not Null,
	Business_Type nvarchar(20)

)
WITH(DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	HEAP)


INSERT INTO RateCodes (RateCodeId, RateCode, IsApproved) 
VALUES 
(1, 'Standard Rate', 1),
(2, 'JFK', 1),
(3, 'Newark', 1),
(4, 'Westchester', 0),
(5, 'Negotiated fare', 1),
(6, 'GroupRide', 1)

INSERT INTO Vendor VALUES 
(1,'Creative Mobile Technologies,LLC')
, (2,'VeriFone Inc')


INSERT INTO Dim.Business VALUES 
('HV0002','Juno'),
('HV0003','Uber'),
('HV0004', 'Via'),
('HV0005', 'Lyft')



/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[bulk_load_TaxiZones]    Script Date: 24-08-2022 15:27:27 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

ALTER PROC [dbo].[bulk_load_TaxiZones] AS
BEGIN

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'TaxiZones' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE Dim.TaxiZones
	(
	 [LocationID] bigint,
	 [Borough] nvarchar(400),
	 [Zone] nvarchar(400),
	 [service_zone] nvarchar(400)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)

ELSE
	TRUNCATE TABLE Dim.TaxiZones

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestration​
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_TaxiZones
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO DIM.TaxiZones
(LocationID 1, Borough 2, Zone 3, service_zone 4)
FROM 'https://dssavdprojdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/taxidataraw/TaxiZones'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 10
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://dssavdprojdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/taxidataraw/Errors/'
)
END
GO

DELETE
 FROM [dbo].[RateCodes] WHERE [RateCodeID]=2

 select * FROM [dbo].[RateCodes]

 select * from [dbo].[Vendor]

 select * from Dim.Business
